title: 3 Bed/2 Bath Playa Vista Penthouse
posting_body: Rare, Penthouse view home along Bluff Creek for lease in the highly sought after Mason community.
You will have your own private, direct access through the spacious attached two car garage which leads into an open floor plan layout with bluff views from the balcony.
The large, full height windows allow generous amounts of natural light into the living room which is accented by high ceilings.

Entertain guests in this impressive kitchen, outfitted with a stone countertop island, state of the art Viking stainless steel appliances, and personal wine fridge that accompanies the adjoining dining area.
The primary suite features a full walk-in closet fit for any wardrobe, dual side by side sinks, gorgeous countertops, luxurious seated shower and a separate, deep soaking tub.
The Penthouse also features two additional bedrooms, with another full bath, as well as a separate washroom that includes the in-unit washer and dryer with built-in cabinetry.
The endless Playa Vista amenities include access to the nearby Resort and Center Pointe Club, dazzling pools for relaxing, fitness facilities and the area's best parks.
You are also in close proximity to a Cinemark Movie complex, Whole Foods and of course, the multiple beaches on the coastline.
This is a once in a lifetime opportunity that will not last long!
